template.name: Antminer S9
template.description:
# Bitmain Antminer S9 monitor # https://github.com/dima666d/antminerS9i # Just put "s9*.sh" files to the Zabbix ExternalScripts directory (/etc/zabbix/externalscripts by default). Required utilites: nc, timeout, time. only bash, no perl, no python and no etc
If you like my work, please consider donating: BTC: 39DyYL4NxvBv1BTR7RK9UJJisqhTCQhFFa Dmitry Dvinskikh <dima@tevirp.ru>

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 S restarted less then {$REBOOT_TIME} sec ago
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of fans changed!
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of miners changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM resp is not suc
{HOST.NAME} S9 S BM N of ACN changed!

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 URL {#POOL} of miner was changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 User {#POOL} of miner was changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 max Temp on chip N{#TEMP} >{$TEMP_MAX_MAX}C
{HOST.NAME} S9 max Temp on pcb N{#TEMP} >{{$TEMP_MAX_MAX}C

macro.description: check uptime and no data time
